meanings.def: belonging to a period of history that is thousands of years in the past
examples: Archaeologists are excavating the ruined temples of this ancient civilization.

meanings.def: very old; having existed for a very long time
examples: the ancient Japanese art of origami
(humorous) He's ancient—he must be at least fifty!
The area is still covered by huge ancient forests.

meanings.def: the people who lived in ancient times, especially the Egyptians, Greeks and Romans

related: The Rime of the Ancient Mariner
